functions.tag: {author:"Keeper of the Vault",title:"Gaining Entrance",resolved:1b,pages:["One people, one goal, one vault, yet four levers throughout the cavern lock the entrance.","The lever first, in the west wall of the Cavern Bazaar.","The lever second, on the upper floor of the Hermit's Dark House, at the East Undead Lockaway.","The lever third, near the base of the southern elevator, across the bridge far beneath the West Undead Lockaway.","The lever fourth, in the arena situated between the Mural Hall and the Butchering Room."]}
